sources.first_edition: October, 1781, Vienna, Artaria: Op. 32 no. 2 (for title, see No. 195)

(c. 1790), Paris, Le Duc: Op. 32 no. 2 (for title, see No. 195)

entries.notes: Listed as 'quartettino... opera piccola' in Boccherini's autograph catalogue

continues_from_previous.section_note: Part of section (B) regarding six quartets (Nos. 195-200) as duets for two harpsichords, arranged by unknown 18th century arranger
